item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: January 29, 2024 Today's Verse Romans 6:14 [14] For sin will have no dominion over you, since you are not under law but under grace. This Year's Memory Verse Review Isaiah 40:28 - Have you not known? Have you not heard? The Lord is the everlasting God, the Creator of the ends of the earth. He does not faint or grow weary; his understanding is unsearchable.
